targets.expr:
(sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",stage="commit_accepted_block", role="fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*" }[$interval])) / sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", stage="commit_accepted_block", role="fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~"^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*"}[$interval])))

(sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",stage="commit_accepted_block", role="fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*" }[$interval])) / sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", stage="commit_accepted_block", role="fullnode", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*"}[$interval])))

sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator", stage="consensus_pulled"}[$interval])) / sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator", stage="consensus_pulled"}[$interval]))

avg(rate(quorum_store_batch_to_PoS_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(quorum_store_batch_to_PoS_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

avg(rate(quorum_store_pos_to_pull_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(quorum_store_pos_to_pull_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Txn latency per role and submitted_by

targets.expr: sum by (role, submitted_by) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="commit_accepted_block"}[$interval])) / sum by (role, submitted_by) (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="commit_accepted_block"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Txn to block timestamp per role and submitted_by

panels.description: The time between the local Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator", stage="consensus_pulled"}[$interval])) / sum (rate(velor_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator", stage="consensus_pulled"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Avg Insertion-to-Batch-Pulled

panels.description: Histogram of the time durations from batch creation to PoS creation.

targets.expr: avg(rate(quorum_store_batch_to_PoS_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(quorum_store_batch_to_PoS_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: BATCH_TO_POS_DURATION

panels.description: Histogram for how long it took a PoS to go from inserted to pulled into a proposed block.

targets.expr: avg(rate(quorum_store_pos_to_pull_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(quorum_store_pos_to_pull_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: POS_TO_PULL

targets.expr: velor_proposer_delay_proposal{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} > 0

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the leader signs it.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="signed"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="signed"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block creation to signed

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node ordered the block.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="ordered"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="ordered"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Block creation to ordered

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node executes the block.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="executed"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="executed"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Block creation to executed

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node commits it.

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Block creation to commit

panels.description: The time between when the block was proposed by the validators until the fullnodes synced the data.

targets.expr: sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",role="fullnode",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",role="fullnode",kubernetes_pod_name=~"^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",kubernetes_pod_name=~"^^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Avg. Block timestamp to synced

panels.description: The time between when the block was committed by the validators until the fullnodes synced the data.

targets.expr:
(sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",role="fullnode",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
-
quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$__rate_interval]))

(sum by (role) (rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",role="fullnode",kubernetes_pod_name=~"^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (role) (rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",kubernetes_pod_name=~"^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*"}[$__rate_interval]))) 
-
quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Avg. State sync latencies

panels.description: The time between when the block was committed by the validators until the VFNs synced the data.

targets.expr:
(sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",role="fullnode",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*"}[$__rate_interval])))
-
quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: VFN state sync latencies

panels.description: The time between when the data was committed by the VFNs until the PFNs synced the data.

targets.expr:
(sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",role="fullnode",kubernetes_pod_name=~"^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",kubernetes_pod_name=~"^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*"}[$__rate_interval])))
-
(sum by (role) (rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",role="fullnode",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (role) (rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace",label="propose_to_sync_latency",kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: PFN state sync latencies

panels.description: The stacked view of the state sync latencies for the VFNs in forge.

targets.expr:
(sum(rate(velor_data_client_request_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*",role="fullnode",request_type=~"get_new_transactions_or_outputs_with_proof_compressed|get_transactions_or_outputs_with_proof_compressed"}[$__rate_interval])))
/
(sum(rate(velor_data_client_request_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*",role=~"fullnode",request_type=~"get_new_transactions_or_outputs_with_proof_compressed|get_transactions_or_outputs_with_proof_compressed"}[$__rate_interval])))

(sum(rate(velor_state_sync_storage_synchronizer_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*",role="fullnode",label!="commit_chunk"}[$__rate_interval])))
/
(sum(rate(velor_state_sync_storage_synchronizer_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*",role=~"fullnode",label!="commit_chunk"}[$__rate_interval])))

(sum(rate(velor_state_sync_storage_synchronizer_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*",role=~"$role",label="commit_chunk"}[$__rate_interval])))
/
(sum(rate(velor_state_sync_storage_synchronizer_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*velor-node-.*-fullnode-.*",role=~"$role",label="commit_chunk"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: (Ignore) State sync latencies stacked (VFN in Forge)

panels.description: The stacked view of the state sync latencies for the PFNs in forge.

sum(rate(velor_state_sync_storage_synchronizer_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*",role=~"$role",label="commit_chunk"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum(rate(velor_state_sync_storage_synchronizer_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"^(pfn|public-fullnode-).*",role=~"$role",label="commit_chunk"}[$__rate_interval]))
